meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>room</kanji> where you <kanji>exhibit</kanji> things in a <kanji>row</kanji> is a <vocabulary>showroom</vocabulary>. Maybe there are cars lined up, or boats, or tiny porcelain cats! Either way, they need a nice big showroom to show them off.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
